name: Community Block Party
venue: Palace Theatre Albany, 19 Clinton Ave, Albany, NY 12207
description: A free family-friendly event featuring fun activities and community engagement in Downtown Albany. Perfect for all ages to enjoy a vibrant day out.

name: The Little Mermaid - Free Movie
venue: Palace Theatre Albany, 19 Clinton Ave, Albany, NY 12207
description: Part of the Summer in the City series, enjoy a free screening of Disney's The Little Mermaid. Doors open at noon for family activities, movie starts at 1:00 PM.

name: Brad Williams: The Growth Spurt Tour 2025
venue: Palace Theatre Albany, 19 Clinton Ave, Albany, NY 12207
description: Comedian Brad Williams brings his hilarious stand-up show to Albany as part of his 2025 tour. Expect sharp wit and relatable humor.

name: Mendelssohn Club of Albany Holiday Concert
venue: The Egg, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12220
description: The longest continuously performing arts group in the Capital District since 1909, the Mendelssohn Club presents a holiday concert featuring a diverse male chorus from the region.
